title: What Happened to Pogačar’s Purple Pants? UCI Threatens Giro d’Italia Leader with Sanctions for ‘Non-Compliant’ Shorts
content:
'The organizers gave us the skinsuit ... then we got a call from the UCI saying it's not allowed': Polemica erupts as UCI rules against Giro-supplied apparel.

Read the full article at What Happened to Pogačar’s Purple Pants? UCI Threatens Giro d’Italia Leader with Sanctions for ‘Non-Compliant’ Shorts on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
